titleStmt.title: The new disorders of love A gallant novel. Written by Richard Gibbs, of Norwich, philo. medici.
titleStmt.author: Gibbs, Richard, fl. 1681-1687.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for R. Bentley and S. Magnes, in Russel-street, in Covent-Garden,

notesStmt.note: Harvard University Library copy imperfect; pages stained and torn, with some loss of print; considerable print show-through.
Reproductions of the originals in the Harvard University Library and the Bodleian Library.
